title: Smart Data Models - Smart Spot
description: Smart Data models Smart Spot entity schema intended for validation tools

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be SmartSpot

announcedUrl.description: Property. URL broadcasted by the device. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'

signalStrength.description: Property. Signal strength to adjust the announcement range. Enum:'highest, lowest, medium'

bluetoothChannel.description: Property. Bluetooth channels where to transmit the announcement.  Model:'https://schema.org/Text'

coverageRadius.description: Property. Radius of the spot coverage area in meters. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

announcementPeriod.description: Property. Period between announcements in milliseconds. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'

availability.description: Property. Specifies the time intervals in which this interactive service is available, but this is a general information while Smart Spots have their own real availability in order to allow advanced configurations. Model:'https://schema.org/openingHours'

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refSmartPointOfInteraction.description: Relationship. Reference to the Smart Point of Interaction which includes this Smart Spot. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'
